meanings.definition: The study of abnormalities in physiological development.
meanings.sent1: In teratology, scientists examine how things grow differently in bodies.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use teratology to understand why some babies are born with health problems.
meanings.sent3: The class on teratology was so interesting, we learned about how bodies can develop in strange ways.
meanings.sent4: Her fascination with teratology led her to explore the mysteries of abnormal growth.
meanings.sent5: The textbook on teratology illustrated various ways bodies can develop abnormally.

meanings.definition: The branch of medicine concerned with the study of birth defects.
meanings.sent1: Teratology helps doctors learn about why some babies are born with defects.
meanings.sent2: The hospital has a special department dedicated to teratology research.
meanings.sent3: The doctor joked that he needed a teratology manual to understand the unusual case.
meanings.sent4: She saw the field of teratology as a key to unlocking the secrets of birth defects.
meanings.sent5: The documentary explained how teratology has advanced the treatment of birth defects.

meanings.definition: The scientific study of monsters or abnormal growths.
meanings.sent1: In teratology, researchers investigate the origins of mythical creatures.
meanings.sent2: The movie explored the concept of teratology through its depiction of fantastical beings.
meanings.sent3: The children's book turned teratology into a fun adventure with magical creatures.
meanings.sent4: His imagination ran wild as he delved into the world of teratology and monstrous beings.
meanings.sent5: The artist's drawings were inspired by the bizarre creatures found in teratology studies.
